snippet: The cost of entering the race has jumped about $60, or 24 to 39 percent, depending on the entrant.
abstract: New York City Marathon organizers raise entry fee about $60, or 24 to 39 percent, depending on the entrant; increase is largely because New York Police Department has begun charging event organizers to recoup its costs.
lead_paragraph: The cost of entering the race has jumped about $60, or 24 to 39 percent, depending on the entrant.

headline.seo: New York City Marathon Raises Entry Fee
headline.main: New York Marathon Raises Entry Fee, Citing Police Costs
headline.print_headline: New York Marathon Raises Entry Fee, Citing Police Costs
